plot: This film is about providing safe water for the people of Cambodia, who lost everything to mass genocide: their doctors, lawyers, schools, religion, and most importantly their way of life. ...
title: A Drop in the Bucket
plot_es: This film is about providing safe water for the people of Cambodia, who lost everything to mass genocide: their doctors, lawyers, schools, religion, and most importantly their way of life. ...
